scripts.build: cd pystol-wui && npm run-script build && cd .. && cp -R pystol-wui/build/* public/
scripts.k8s-server: export PYSTOL_SCRIPT=k8s_server && chmod +x ./env.sh && ./env.sh && cp env-config.js ./public/ && npm start
scripts.dev: export PYSTOL_SCRIPT=dev && export NODE_ENV=mock && chmod +x ./env.sh && ./env.sh && cp env-config.js ./public/ && npm start
